alb_dns_name.description: ALB DNS name (use this if you did not configure a custom domain).

ecr_repository_url.description: ECR repository URL to push the app image to.

app_port.description: Container port for Streamlit. Dockerfile exposes 8050.

container_image.description: Full container image URI (e.g., <acct>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/repo:tag). If empty, uses the ECR repo created by this stack with tag 'latest'.

domain_name.description: Optional custom domain name (e.g., app.example.com). If empty, no Route53/ACM resources are created and ALB will be HTTP only.

enable_https.description: Enable HTTPS listener with ACM cert when domain_name is provided.

enable_nat_gateway.description: Whether to create a NAT gateway for private subnets (required for ECS tasks in private subnets to reach OpenAI).

faiss_efs_path.description: Path inside the container where the FAISS index will be stored (EFS mounted).

hosted_zone_id.description: Route53 hosted zone ID for domain_name. Required if domain_name is set.

openai_api_key.description: OpenAI API key. If provided, it will be stored in Secrets Manager. Prefer setting via TF_VAR_openai_api_key env var.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.

single_nat_gateway.description: If true, create a single NAT gateway (cheaper, less HA). If false, create one per AZ.
